Name: Robozarro
About the game: 2D Physics Mayhem! Robozarro is a physics-based, 2-D action game, where robots B0-3 and 0-Ramatron embark on an epic quest through the outskirts, underbelly, and rooftops of Mech Angeles, to uncover the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Dr. Zarro. Features 2D physics mayhem! Robozarro uses a 2D physics engine that brings the game's action to life, creating unpredictable encounters with enemies! Master the 'Grab N Blast', a physics-manipulation tool that turns enemies and/or the environment into explosive weapons! Robots love junk! Collect Junk while adventuring through Mech Angeles and trade it in for Health, grenades, or ammo upgrades! Recover the Robo-Claw, Mega-Charge, and other gadgets that will aid in your journey across Mech Angeles! Gotta go fast! Unlock Time Trials Mode and attempt to beat levels with no checkpoints and/or no damage!
